description: The underlying issue causing the problem is attributed to specific updates delivered through KB5034763, affecting Windows OS builds 19044 and 19045. These updates were released on February 13, 2024, and have been known to introduce instability. Users reported issues with the system's functionality following the installation of these updates, indicative of possible misconfiguration or bugs embedded within the updates themselves. Tracking back through the build versions revealed inconsistencies that led to crashes of the file explorer, emphasizing the importance of properly vetting and testing these updates before application in enterprise environments. This situation illustrates the critical nature of ongoing patch management and monitoring post-implementation of updates to preemptively address such anomalies in system performance.
